Description:

1715 . Pirates of the Caribbean seasoned and even set up their own illegal republic , where corruption , greed and cruelty have become commonplace .
Among these there is a young rogue brash named Edward Kenuey . Fight for glory brought him authority worthy of the pirate legend nicknamed Blackbeard , but pulled him into a war
between the Assassins and the Templars , which can destroy everything that created the pirates .

Features Repack: 

- Release is based on the Assassin's Creed IV - Black Flag Uplay Digital Deluxe Edition
- Cut : multiplayer and voice except Russian and English
- Recoded : nothing
- Setup time : ~ 11 minutes

+ Freedom Cry
+ Black Island
+ Mystery Island
+ Sacrifice Island
